title: Agra
content: Home to the iconic Taj Mahal and rich Mughal heritage.

title: Jaipur
content: The Pink City known for forts, palaces, and Rajasthani culture.

title: Udaipur
content: Romantic city of lakes and royal palaces in Rajasthan.

title: Delhi
content: Capital city with historical landmarks and bustling markets.

title: Mumbai
content: India financial hub with Bollywood, beaches, and nightlife.

title: Bangalore
content: Tech city with parks, cafes, and pleasant weather.

title: Hyderabad
content: City of pearls, biryani, and the Charminar.

title: Chennai
content: Cultural capital of South India with temples and beaches.

title: Kolkata
content: City of Joy with colonial charm, art, and culture.

title: Varanasi
content: Spiritual city on the Ganges with ancient ghats and rituals.

title: Leh-Ladakh
content: Cold desert, monasteries, and dramatic Himalayan landscapes.

title: Manali
content: Popular hill station with rivers and snow-capped mountains.

title: Shimla
content: Colonial hill town with scenic views and toy train.

title: Goa
content: Famous for its beaches, nightlife, and Portuguese heritage.

title: Pondicherry
content: French colonial town with cafes, beaches, and serenity.

title: Mysore
content: Royal heritage city with palaces and Dasara festivities.

title: Amritsar
content: Home to the Golden Temple and rich Sikh culture.

title: Rishikesh
content: Yoga capital with river rafting and Ganga aarti.

title: Darjeeling
content: Tea gardens, Himalayan views, and toy train rides.

title: Coorg
content: Scenic coffee plantations and misty hills in Karnataka.

title: Paris
content: Romantic city known for the Eiffel Tower, cafes, and art.

title: London
content: Historic landmarks, museums, and vibrant culture.

title: New York
content: Iconic skyscrapers, Broadway, and Central Park.

title: Tokyo
content: High-tech meets tradition with temples and neon lights.

title: Rome
content: Ancient ruins, Vatican City, and Italian cuisine.

title: Barcelona
content: Modernist architecture, beaches, and lively atmosphere.

title: Dubai
content: Luxury shopping, skyscrapers, and desert safaris.

title: Bangkok
content: Street food, temples, and floating markets.

title: Bali
content: Tropical paradise with temples, rice terraces, and beaches.

title: Singapore
content: Clean, green city with Marina Bay Sands and Sentosa.

title: Istanbul
content: Where East meets West, mosques, and bazaars.

title: Cape Town
content: Table Mountain, beaches, and diverse culture.

title: Sydney
content: Opera House, Bondi Beach, and laid-back lifestyle.

title: Amsterdam
content: Canals, cycling, tulips, and Van Gogh Museum.

title: Vienna
content: Classical music, architecture, and coffee houses.

title: Zurich
content: Swiss Alps views, clean streets, and lakes.

title: Toronto
content: Multicultural city with CN Tower and nearby Niagara Falls.

title: Reykjavik
content: Gateway to Iceland’s glaciers and Northern Lights.

title: Prague
content: Medieval architecture, bridges, and historic charm.

title: Seoul
content: Trendy city with palaces, K-pop, and street food.

title: Ranthambore
content: A famous national park in Rajasthan known for tigers and wildlife safaris.

title: Kaziranga
content: A UNESCO World Heritage site in Assam known for one-horned rhinoceroses.

title: Puri
content: A coastal city in Odisha known for Jagannath Temple and beaches.

title: Rameswaram
content: A sacred town in Tamil Nadu known for the Ramanathaswamy Temple and pilgrimage importance.

title: Tawang
content: A picturesque town in Arunachal Pradesh known for its monastery and Himalayan views.

title: Ziro Valley
content: Located in Arunachal Pradesh, it is famous for lush landscapes and tribal culture.

title: Bundi
content: A charming town in Rajasthan known for its palaces, forts, and stepwells.

title: Panchgani
content: A scenic hill station in Maharashtra popular for its strawberry farms and table land.

title: Daman and Diu
content: A coastal union territory known for Portuguese heritage and calm beaches.

title: Hampi
content: A UNESCO World Heritage Site in Karnataka with ancient ruins of the Vijayanagara Empire.

title: Spiti Valley
content: A cold desert mountain valley in Himachal Pradesh ideal for adventure seekers.

title: Kanha National Park
content: One of India's best tiger reserves located in Madhya Pradesh.

title: Chilika Lake
content: Asia’s largest brackish water lagoon in Odisha, a bird watcher's paradise.

title: Gokarna
content: A serene beach town in Karnataka known for pilgrimage and quiet shores.

title: Orchha
content: A historic town in Madhya Pradesh with palaces, temples, and forts.

title: Dharamshala
content: The Dalai Lama’s residence and a spiritual hill town in Himachal Pradesh.

title: Kumarakom
content: A village in Kerala famous for backwaters, bird sanctuary, and houseboats.

title: Kodaikanal
content: A misty hill station in Tamil Nadu known as the 'Princess of Hill Stations'.

title: Coonoor
content: A quaint hill station near Ooty in Tamil Nadu, perfect for tea garden walks.

title: Lonavala
content: A popular monsoon getaway from Mumbai and Pune known for greenery and waterfalls.
